text: فَأَهۡلَكۡنَآ أَشَدَّ مِنۡهُم بَطۡشٗا وَمَضَىٰ مَثَلُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

translation.en: And We destroyed greater than them in [striking] power, and the example of the former peoples has preceded
translation.id: Karena itu, Kami binasakan orang-orang yang lebih besar kekuatannya di antara mereka dan telah berlalu contoh umat-umat terdahulu
